capability.name: Continuity Planning
capability.definition: This capability focuses on developing, maintaining, and testing continuity plans and supporting facilities for various failure scenarios to ensure business continuity.
capability.role: Develop, maintain and test continuity plans and supporting facilities for an appropriate range of possible failure scenarios
capability.example: A business continuity plan is developed for key business activities and assurance tests performed
